author: cnbc.com
title: CareerStaff acquires Remedy Rehab
text:
DALLAS, May 01, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- CareerStaff Unlimited, a leading provider of workforce solutions for the healthcare industry, announced the completed acquisition of Remedy Rehab ( http://www.remedyrehab.com ), a supplier of rehabilitation therapy staffing services to healthcare organizations throughout northern California.
Remedy Rehab is a pioneer in the rehabilitation staffing marketplace, having initiated services to healthcare organizations in northern California over 20 years ago. The Company, which was founded by Julie Cheng, PT, specializes in the temporary staffing of Physical Therapists, Occupational Therapists and Speech Language Pathologists to healthcare organizations throughout northern California.
“Over the last few years, the U.S. healthcare system has experienced a dramatic acceleration in the shortage of skilled healthcare professionals. This supply constraint has significantly impacted healthcare organizations causing them to struggle to meet their staffing requirements while trying to effectively manage patient care and maintain positive operating margins. CareerStaff is focused on providing its clients with leading solutions that can help address these issues and combat disruptions in patient care. We look forward to working with the Remedy Rehab team and expect the company to continue as a market leader for many years to come,” said Stephen Saville, President of CareerStaff.
“This is an exciting day for our company and I am pleased to have our team join CareerStaff,” said Julie Cheng, President of Remedy Rehab. “Our focus from day one has been on quality. We have been very fortunate to work with great clinicians and we are thrilled to partner with CareerStaff, allowing us to expand our services and grow quickly without sacrificing our commitment to hiring quality clinicians who deliver excellent patient care.”
About Remedy Rehab, Inc:
Remedy Rehab, Inc. (“Remedy Rehab”) is one of northern California’s premier therapy staffing organizations specializing in the temporary staffing of physical and occupational therapist and speech language pathologists. The company has served healthcare organizations in northern California with distinction for over 20 years.
About CareerStaff Unlimited, LLC:
CareerStaff Unlimited, LLC (“CareerStaff”) is a leader in the delivery of workforce solutions for the healthcare industry. Our mission is to connect healthcare organizations with talented healthcare professionals ensuring the delivery of exceptional patient care. We serve our mission by leveraging a national network of 6 brands and 25 offices throughout the United States. CareerStaff’s services include travel and per diem employment opportunities for nurses, therapists and pharmacists. By offering unrivaled customer service, unique placement opportunities, top pay and benefits and employment that meets the lifestyle requirements of our clinicians, CareerStaff attracts high quality clinicians who transition well to new environments and rapidly assimilate into facility teams.
To learn more about CareerStaff Unlimited, LLC, visit www.careerstaff.com or contact Rebekah Naramore at 972-812-3211.
